title: Inbound visitor growth in the Middle East 2011 to 2019
summary: In general Year-over-year visitor growth has fallen over the Year.
Year-over-year visitor growth is slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The line significantly increased by 2.3 from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Year-over-year visitor growth, about 8.0 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Year-over-year visitor growth, of value 1.2 was reported at Year 2016
min_summary: Overall Year-over-year visitor growth has decreased over the Year.
Year-over-year visitor growth is slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
